title: Oblivion mod: Qarl's Texture Pack 3 patch 1.3
description:
This is a patch for great Oblivion texture mod QTP3. Because people has hard time to find this patch I&#039;ll made this torrent. 

Patch features:

1.3
* Added parallax mapping to Bruma roofs
* Enhanced a couple normal maps of landscape textures
* Fixed unsightly seams in chargen area
* Added parallaxing to a cave exterior (thanks tro dev_akm!)

1.2 
* Fixed normal map error on Fort Ruins interior ceiling which caused an unsightly seam. 

1.1 
* Added snowflakes 
* Fixed Haunted Mansion Anvil mesh. 

Installation: unpack into your OblivionData folder, overwriting any previous files.
